specs.label: Output level (SPL)
specs.value: Approx. 104 dB digital / 106 dB analog (EN 60065/A12:2011 compliant)

specs.label: Ear and headband cushions
specs.value: Cabretta top-grain sheepskin leather; perforated ear cushions

specs.label: Drive cable
specs.value: Dual mono, shielded, ultra-low capacitance, silver-plated OFHC with silicone/Kevlar reinforcement (2 m)

specs.label: Notes
specs.value: Paired with Aperio electronics featuring dual 32-bit ESS Sabre DACs and reference-grade amp modules
